message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be a great fit for your needs. I'm asking for $14,000 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $11,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down a little. How about $12,500? That would give us both a good deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $12,250? That's the lowest I can go
